attributes.action: Make creative subjects a compulsory option for GCSE students
attributes.additional_details:
Many young people heavily rely on the more creative subjects as an opportunity to express themselves, which they would struggle to express through verbal communication.

Suicide rates for teenagers have increased rapidly over the years. We need to ensure that future generations are being educated on different ways to express their feelings!

We are all aware that everybody in this world is unique in different ways. We can't all be exceptionally gifted at academic subject, such as science and maths. If we were all talented at these subjects then the employment rates would decrease even more.

The Government are adamant to continue cutting funds and creative subjects altogether.

We have the power and responsibility to make a positive influence on the future generations and their well being. Let's stand up for what's right and make a change!
